title: is riot ever gonna have RP be a reward for ranked?
body: right now ranked is a big circus shit show of monkeys trying to one up each other and lose their sanity in the process. and for what? a lame skin and icon? makes joining that circus not at all worth it. if riot were to give RP as a reward for preforming well in the ranked circus then maybe the climb wouldn't be so bad. but will riot ever do that?
